name: Margherita
description: Classic Margherita pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

name: Pepperoni
description: Spicy pepperoni slices topped on mozzarella cheese and rich tomato sauce.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy grilled beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A delicious burger with a grilled vegetable patty, fresh lettuce, and vegan mayo.

name: Chocolate Brownie
description: Warm chocolate brownie served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Cheesecake
description: Smooth and creamy cheesecake with a buttery graham cracker crust.
